name: Fate Reforged: Comprehensive
description: A huge Fate Reforged–inspired package featuring Bolster, Dash, Manifest, Delve, Prowess, Ferocious, Siege-style modal enchantments, plus Dragon and Warrior tribal hooks.

Instant: Bolster {BOLSTER_N}. {BOLSTER_REMINDER}

MANIFEST_INTRO: Manifest the top card of your library
Manifest a card from your hand
Manifest the top two cards of your library, then put one back on top
FEROCIOUS_INTRO: Ferocious — If you control a creature with power 4 or greater,
Ferocious — Then if you control a creature with power 4 or greater,
PROWESS_REMINDER: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
DELVE_REMINDER: Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
KHANS_OR_DRAGONS: As this enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons.
When this enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons.
KHANS_EFFECT: At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 2.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gains first strike until end of turn.
DRAGONS_EFFECT: At the beginning of your end step, this deals 2 damage to each opponent.
Creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.
Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.
At the beginning of combat on each opponent's turn, tap up to one target creature that player controls.
WARRIOR_HOOK: Whenever a Warrior you control attacks, {ATTACK_TRIGGER}.
DRAGON_HOOK: Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, {DRAGON_TRIGGER}.
ATTACK_TRIGGER: that creature gains first strike until end of turn
you may have it deal 1 damage to any target
DRAGON_TRIGGER: it fights up to one target creature you don't control
it deals 2 damage to any target
MANIFEST_REMINDER: (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
DASH_REMINDER: (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste and is returned to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)
BOLSTER_REMINDER: (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put {BOLSTER_N} +1/+1 counters on it.)
TEMUR_TOUGH: target creature you control fights up to one target creature you don't control
creatures you control gain trample until end of turn
put two +1/+1 counters on target creature
